name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Comments first on IS.fi and HS.fi

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows you the most important content first

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show comments on the top of the page on is.fi and hs.fi instead of at the end of the article pages so you can read the most important content first. Icons made by Smashicons from www.flaticon.com
